dublin_core.dcvalue: Hesperian HealthWiki increases access to mHealth and eHealth information by promoting the use of libraries and providing content in local languages.

Julia Nakad, Executive Assistant, Hesperian Health Guides, Email: julia@hesperian.org
The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Rockefeller Foundation, K4Health
